objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#8D4B4B'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#5A2A2A'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='goldGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D4AF37'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#9C7521'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#F5EFE6' stroke='url(#goldGradient)' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='130' fill='url(#goldGradient)'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='20' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='950' cy='180' r='15' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='120' cy='700' r='25' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='850' r='20' fill='#D4AF37'/></g><path d='M50 150 L150 250' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M950 150 L850 250' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M150 850 L250 750' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M850 850 L750 750' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='none' stroke='url(#goldGradient)' stroke-width='10' opacity='0.15'/></svg>

objects.text: • PREMIUM DESIGN • SPACIOUS STORAGE • GOLD HARDWARE

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner promotes a fashionable tote handbag with a luxurious and elegant aesthetic. The layout centers a product image prominently within a circular light background boosted by a golden outline, drawing focus to the item. Positioned above the product are two headline text layers, `heading` and `subheading`, conveying the brand and tone. The price is emphasized inside a golden circular shape at the top-right using text layer `price`. Below the image, the `description` text layer highlights three key product benefits. The call-to-action, composed of a golden rectangle `cta_background` and bold text `cta`, invites users to shop. Subtle gradient accents, radial highlights, and scattered golden elements enhance the premium vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon: `#5A2A2A`
- Rich Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Light Cream: `#F5EFE6`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Brown: `#9C7521`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated, elegant handbag in a muted camel brown tone, paired harmoniously with gold metallic accents. The primary color of the bag is a warm tan brown (#B28064), which provides a neutral, classic base suitable for upscale branding. The gold-tone hardware and charm detailing (#D4AF37) adds a touch of luxury and sophistication, creating visual interest through contrast. These metallic highlights catch and reflect light, giving the product an elevated aesthetic. Minimal branding and smooth, textured finishes contribute to a clean, premium look. For an advertisement banner, complementary colors like ivory (#F8F3ED) and deep espresso (#4B3621) can be used to enhance elegance and focus.
